headline: Which Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stocks Are Billionaires Buying the Most?
summary: Two AI stocks especially stand out.

headline: Nvidia vs. Everybody Else: Competition Mounts Against the Top AI Chip Company
summary: Armed with the most advanced blueprints for graphics processing units, or GPUs, and helped by the rapid pace of innovation at  Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing  the contract fabricator that makes 90% of the world’s advanced AI chips, Nvidia has become synonymous with AI processors.  New entrants to the AI chip-design business, including Google and  Amazon  are talking about selling their most advanced chips, which rival Nvidia’s GPUs in power and efficiency, to an array of outside customers.  Smaller rivals like Advanced Micro Devices, Qualcomm and  Broadcom  are introducing products that help them focus more intently on AI data-center computing.

raw.headline: Nvidia vs. Everybody Else: Competition Mounts Against the Top AI Chip Company

Smaller rivals like Advanced Micro Devices, Qualcomm and  Broadcom  are introducing products that help them focus more intently on AI data-center computing.

headline: Fed's rate decision, Oracle & Broadcom earnings: What to Watch
summary: Market Domination Overtime host Josh Lipton takes a look at the top stories for investors to watch next week, starting Monday, Dec. 8. Another wave of earnings is on tap: Toll Brothers (TOL) on Monday, Campbell's (CPB) and Cracker Barrel (CBRL) on Tuesday, Oracle (ORCL) and Adobe (ADBE) on Wednesday, Broadcom (AVGO) and Costco (COST) on Thursday, and Rent the Runway (RENT) on Friday, among others. The Small Business Association's (SBA's) National Federation of Independent Business (NFIB) will release its monthly Small Business Optimism Index. The Federal Reserve's December meeting will kick off on Tuesday, while the FOMC's decision on interest rates will be announced on Wednesday. Tune in to Yahoo Finance on Wednesday, Dec. 10 at 2:00 p.m. for live coverage of Fed Chair Jerome Powell's post-decision press conference. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination Overtime.
